thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Phoenix Mecano Q1 Operating Result Up At EUR 13.8 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Phoenix Mecano Q1 Operating Result Up At EUR 13.8 Mln
text:
PHOENIX MECANO AG:
* FY GROSS SALES INCREASED FROM EUR583.2 MILLION TO EUR627.6 MILLION (UP 7.6%)
* FY OPERATING RESULT ROSE BY 13.1% FROM EUR35.2 MILLION TO EUR39.7 MILLION
* GROSS SALES IN Q1 OF 2018 INCREASED YEAR-ON-YEAR TO EUR169.7 MILLION
* Q1 INCOMING ORDERS WERE UP BY 11.6% COMPARED WITH SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR, AT EUR181.2 MILLION
* Q1 OPERATING RESULT GREW BY A DISPROPORTIONATELY HIGH 20.3% TO EUR13.8 MILLION
* SEES GROWTH IN SALES AND OPERATING RESULT IN 2018 * SEES EUR40-46 MILLION AS OUR TARGET RANGE FOR EBIT THIS YEAR
* INCREASE IN DIVIDEND FROM CHF 15 TO CHF 16 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
